GR13vinst_su:18: aṭguṣṭhād ye tu ye parvā VT_80c
GR13vinst_su:287: kiṃ tu yuktaṃ na kena cit VT_125d
GR13vinst_su:315: kṛtvā dhyātvā ca tāḥ kramāt VT_23d
GR13vinst_su:347: khanyaṃ vā rājyam eva ca VT_192d
GR13vinst_su:441: jñātvā kālaṃ ca tattvaṃ tu VT_263c
GR13vinst_su:534: tasmāt kriyāṃ ca kālaṃ ca VT_236c
GR13vinst_su:630: devīnām agrasaṃsthaṃ kṛtabhṛkuṭimukhaṃ cintayed aṅkuśākhyaṃ VT_110a
GR13vinst_su:645: dravyaṃ tasya gṛhe tu yat VT_185b
GR13vinst_su:755: nyastavyaṃ tu yad ādau tu ? VT_204c
GR13vinst_su:805: pun as tat sthāpayitvā tu VT_204a
GR13vinst_su:1053: yas tv idaṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ VT_395c
GR13vinst_su:1061: yaṃ spṛśed darśayed yaṃ tu VT_170c
GR13vinst_su:1082: yena kālaṃ ca vai jñātaṃ VT_233c
GR13vinst_su:1257: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca VT_242c
GR13vinst_su:1338: sa kālaś ca kathaṃ jñeyo VT_237a
GR13vinst_su:1512: striyaṃ vā puruṣam api vā VT_276d
GR13vinst_su:1544: svaiḥ svair bījair nyaset puṣpān VT_37c
GR13vinst_su:1547: ha ra tra vṛddhiṃ karoti VT_346a
